name: Universal Pokemon Randomizer Settings
summary: An RNQS file contains settings for Universal Pokemon Randomizer, a tool used to enhance gameplay in Pokemon games on Windows. It stores information that modifies gameplay, including available Pokemon types, evolution behavior, encounters, learnable moves, and trainer attributes. Players save their Universal Pokemon Randomizer settings as RNQS files to preserve and reuse them later.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
